text: The wolves sent a representation to a flock of sheep, promising them a lasting peace if they handed them over to the dogs. The sheepmen agreed to do so, except for one old lamb whose father said to the wolves, "How can I believe you and live with you if right now, even with the care of the dogs, I cannot keep peace?" Never give up on your own safety.
title: Los lobos, los carneros y el carnero padre
author: nan Esopo
